name: Apparatus Framework

screenshots.caption: The graphical configuration tool while building the library

short_description: The Apparatus Framework is an object oriented software framework written in C++ for embedded applications. It implements RT-OS abstraction, simulation facilities, device and communication concepts, design pattern and more.
